archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.unittitle: Short Hills, NJ Trial Balance Ledger, 1910-1949
did.abstract: The Short Hills, NJ Trial Balance ledger contains expenses for an unidentified household located in the Short Hills area of New Jersey. Entries date from 1910 through 1949.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from the Short Hills, NJ Trial Balance Ledger must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Short Hills, NJ Trial Balance Ledger, Ms2011-087, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Short Hills, NJ Trial Balance Ledger was completed in September 2011.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The Short Hills, NJ Trial Balance ledger contains expenses for an unidentified household located in the Short Hills area of New Jersey. Expenses are divided into three categories: Entries date from 1910 through 1949.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Collection is arranged by material type.

did.unittitle: National Trial Balance Ledger, June 10, 1910 - December 1949
